item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks! I'm glad to see that I'm not the only one who suffers from this. It definitely can be tough to deal with, but hopefully you and I will be able to overcome it properly one day. I know that with me personally, it's the whole fear of having a bad mark on my "permanent" record. Best of luck with your "overthinking" and hope to see you around the comments more!
item.content:encoded:
Thanks!
I’m glad to see that I’m not the only one who suffers from this. It definitely can be tough to deal with, but hopefully you and I will be able to overcome it properly one day. I know that with me personally, it’s the whole fear of having a bad mark on my “permanent” record.
Best of luck with your “overthinking” and hope to see you around the comments more!

item.title: By: Buck Rudder
item.dc:creator: Buck Rudder
item.description: Nice post and nice blog btw. If I can reassure you about this I can tell you I suffer this at the extreme :( I can't play a go game at all, even against a bot (only exceptions are some teaching games). But everything else is perfect in my case and not so bad. I enjoy doing tsumego, reading books and watching tons of video and games (and seeing some live self commented video of games is the top for me because that's the way I play game by procuration). This fear of playing come insidiously step by step in my case so I think it's a good thing to be in alert with it.
item.content:encoded:
Nice post and nice blog btw.
If I can reassure you about this I can tell you I suffer this at the extreme üôÅ
I can’t play a go game at all, even against a bot (only exceptions are some teaching games). But everything else is perfect in my case and not so bad. I enjoy doing tsumego, reading books and watching tons of video and games (and seeing some live self commented video of games is the top for me because that’s the way I play game by procuration).
This fear of playing come insidiously step by step in my case so I think it’s a good thing to be in alert with it.

item.title: By: Ben

item.description: Amen to that. It's like the floodgates just burst open and everything flows out pretty naturally. Hope to see you online in the near future!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: That's odd. Try refreshing and trying again. If it doesn't work, let me know what email you want to use and which subscription list you want and I'll make sure to add you. And I'll be sure to look into it if it's broken.
item.content:encoded: That’s odd. Try refreshing and trying again. If it doesn’t work, let me know what email you want to use and which subscription list you want and I’ll make sure to add you. And I’ll be sure to look into it if it’s broken.

item.description: By the way it won't let me subscribe via email: it comes up with an error "Subscriber not found: Array"
item.content:encoded: By the way it won’t let me subscribe via email: it comes up with an error “Subscriber not found: Array”

item.title: By: scott
item.dc:creator: scott
item.description: It almost seems like it is harder to decide whether to play or not than it is to decide what more to play while in a game. Once I am in a game everything seems so strait forward.
item.content:encoded: It almost seems like it is harder to decide whether to play or not than it is to decide what more to play while in a game. Once I am in a game everything seems so strait forward.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Fascinating! I will definitely take this advice to heart and use it to fuel me writing more blog posts. Definitely much needed advice. Thanks Paul!
item.content:encoded: Fascinating! I will definitely take this advice to heart and use it to fuel me writing more blog posts. Definitely much needed advice. Thanks Paul!
